library:
<class type="owds::JointStatePerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
A robot perception module using robot joint state. Possible parameter is min_period (optional) and robot_name (optional if ontologenius root has been defined). The the robot body parts are taken from the ontology.
<class type="owds::StampedPosePerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
A human perception module using a poseStamped ROS message. Possible parameters are: name. The module subscribe to "/peopleTrack". Remap your topic if needed.
<class type="owds::FakeHumanPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
A human perception module providing fake body parts from a ROS topic. Does not take any parameter.
<class type="owds::FakeHumansPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
A humans perception module providing fake body parts from a ROS topic. Does not take any parameter.
<class type="owds::StaticObjectsPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
An object perception module providing static objects. This module requires a 'file' parameter being a yaml description of the assets to be loaded.
<class type="owds::FakeObjectPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
An object perception module providing fake objects from a ROS topic. Does not take any parameter.
<class type="owds::ObjAreasPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
An area perception module providing predefined areas. This module requires a 'file' parameter being a yaml description of the areas to be loaded.
